website_summaries.verdict: Packed with superfoods, Beyond the Equator will please the health-conscious.
pros: In addition to sunflower seed, this butter includes chia, flax and hemp, and pumpkin too, all of which add omega 3s, fiber, and antioxidants
There are many layers of flavor, making this an interesting peanut butter alternative
cons: Some recent buyers say the recipe is different from before

customer_reviews.title: What happened???!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this 2 months ago and it was the only "butter" that tasted like peanut butter ...minus the seedy texture. I have a 3 yr old autistic son who only eats peanut butter and yogurt. We have to be a nutfree household when my stepson is over, this product was a godsend. Until I just got my second order opened it up and tasted it with my husband...disgusting. Not the same packaging as before, not the same color as before and certainly not the same taste as before. Not sure what happened here. It was almost like we tasted chemicals
customer_reviews.author: jillian

customer_reviews.title: Used to taste great - now tastes like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: This used to be the best-tasting seed butter out there - almost as good as peanut butter. But they changed their recipe recently, and it now tastes like chemicals. A truly vile taste that lingers. I REALLY hope they change it back to how it was. In the meantime, I'll have to look for something else. It's such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... I can say that this is one of the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've spent quite some time in my life exploring alternative nut butters and I can say that this is one of the best on the market. It's creamy with just enough texture to keep things interesting. It's more reminiscent of peanut butter than, say, almond butter but it has a unique and sophisticated sunflower/chia/pumpkin seed flavor that makes it much more exciting. This would be great on any kind of bread, in a smoothie or in baked goods and would make an excellent peanut butter and jelly sandwich for a more precocious (or allergy prone) child. DELICIOUS.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Koerner

customer_reviews.title: Finally a seed butter I can love
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a person who would just eat spoonfuls of peanut butter before I developed an allergy to nuts. I have tried a lot of different seed butters but none was a substitute for that satisfying creamy/crunchy flavor and texture I missed. This is. I tried it as soon as it arrived and I'm so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: WHY DID YOU CHANGE THIS!?
customer_reviews.text: The original was fabulous! Whatever those 20 calories were that they took out made a HUGE difference in the taste and even the consistency. It's very loose, sandy tasting and the flavor is terrible. Bring back the old formula!!!! I threw this out after 1 taste.
customer_reviews.author: Deb R

customer_reviews.title: but I like it better
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is delicious! It’s definitely different than peanut butter, but I like it better. It actually seems more flavorful with many layers of flavor! I also love that it’s healthier than regular peanut butter. And peanut butter with no sugar to me is bland, but not this. It could become addicting!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!, it's green colored
customer_reviews.text: Has a greenish color, it taste AWFUL!! does not have any resemblance to peanut butter. Purchased 2, and they dont offer a refund. I will delete my review in exchange for refund.
customer_reviews.author: easylegal

customer_reviews.title: Not very desirable
customer_reviews.text: It's actually a green color that threw me for a loop. It also tastes really bad. Probably all other nut butters without anything added would taste better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Interesting...surprising
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't sure what to expect, other than looking for a peanut butter alternative. I've tried almond butter which was very hard, perhaps because it was sugar free. This seed butter was sealed, however when I peeled it off I noticed it was quite "soupy". I stirred, reaching to the bottom of the container, and that helped a little. Next, I put it in the refrigerator hoping to solidify it some...no luck. I will say with the soupy consistency, and the dark green pea color it was quite unappetizing to look at. The taste was bland, and I couldn't discern any of the seeds individually.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthful tastes heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: Heavenly taste. A little grainy, but I like seeds and seedy spreads anyway. I wouldn't mind chunky. I only recently decided to indulge myself with gourmet foods on occasion. A big step up for a budget minded person. This product proves that healthful foods can be delicious. Now I wonder how a version with coconut would taste.
customer_reviews.author: Sherahart

customer_reviews.title: Best. Stuff. Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This seed butter is the best seed butter I’ve ever tasted. My family is obsessed. We put it on everything and eat it right out of the jar. I love the combination of seeds and the fact that it didn’t need to be stirred. Will buy this again over and over. It’s worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Not good, not bad, not peanut butter.
customer_reviews.text: I used once and have not again. It did not taste right to me, not bad, not good, just not peanut butter which can not be replaced. I was looking for a more diverse/healthier version to replace peanut butter, but I keep reaching for the peanut butter instead of this. I’m not sure what ‘sheerness’ means, but as far as smoothness, it’s what to expect from a natural nut butter, which I’m used to. (Anything too smooth and easy to spread is strange to me)
customer_reviews.author: ANON

customer_reviews.title: Not good, glad I tried it though.
customer_reviews.text: Usually I eat sunflower seed butter, but wanted to try this. The flavor was way off mark. My mouth felt raw after eating it, the sweetness tasted like aspartame instead of cane sugar, and the overall flavor was very bland. Maybe I'm just used to seed and nut butters having a little salt in them or maybe I have some allergic reaction to one of the "natural flavors" in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving this!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in the fridge with my other nut / seed butters and I love almost everything about it! Not crazy about the color but as soon as I throw fruit on top it's not an issue. I really enjoy the flavor and appreciate the product because it's a great protein for me. I'm wondering if I can use it instead of peanut butter in recipes?! I am definitely try it in overnight oatmeal!
customer_reviews.author: Patty K

customer_reviews.title: Totally Different Taste!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a double pack, one container was partially open and had leaked oil all over. I opened the second container that was not leaking and it tastes completely different than it did previously, almost a burnt and artificial overly sweet taste. Disappointed I can't return the damaged product, and even more disappointed that a product that I loved changed. :(
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great nut butter substitute, not oily or separated
customer_reviews.text: A Wonderful nut butter substitute. It isn’t oily and doesn’t separate after you initially stir it in.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this product all year and have loved it. Something has changed, the taste is not the same. I'm so sad, it's been my "go to" substitute for peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Woody

customer_reviews.title: Love this unsweetened seed butter
customer_reviews.text: This is a yummy alternative to peanut butter or other 'butters'. I like that multiple seeds are used to create a balanced taste. I also like that there is an unsweetened option so I can avoid added sugars. The texture is a little grainy, but it spreads well and is barely noticeable once spread on whole grain bread; I've made my own sunflower/pumpkin/hemp seed butter and the texture of this is better than my homemade version. I'm allergic to tree nuts and I love that this is made in a tree nut free facility.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and much healthier than Nutella.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I eat it on everything from apples and toast to crackers and even ice cream. Delicious and waaaay less sugar than Nutella. It doesn't taste exactly like Nutella but 5 Seed has 4g sugars compared to 21g sugars in Nutella. It has just the right amount of sweetness and the nutritional benefits of chia, flax, pumpkin and hemp. I could binge out eating this stuff with a spoon while watching Tiger King all night long. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Daddy D

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: This 5 seed butter is so good. I am allergic to nuts, dairy and gluten and it is so hard to find products that taste good and are allergy friendly. I would highly recommend this product. This is the best tasting seed butter I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: gross after taste & seller does not offer returns
customer_reviews.text: i had medium high hopes for this, but didnt like the weird aftertaste as mentioned in the other reviews. unfortunately seller wont take return so it goes into the compost. ;( - texture was good. i prefer plain omega nutrition pumpkin seed butter tastewise. i dont understand the aftertaste in this as it has no artifical sweetener in it. oh well
customer_reviews.author: gary silverstein

customer_reviews.title: Healthier than peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: We got this because we found out peanut butter is really bad for dogs, and I always used peanut butter to disguise their medications. When I saw this product, I was excited about the healthy ingredients and hoped we would like it too. I don't really like the taste, but my husband and dog both like it. It seems healthier for both of them, so it's a win!
customer_reviews.author: Wallflower

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Oh god. Where to begin... First off, it smells awful. I gagged. It looks like it was scraped out of my grandkid's diaper and the taste. I scraped my tongue and washed my mouth out. Sorry. This is NOT for me.
customer_reviews.author: The Leopardprint Goddess

customer_reviews.title: They were sealed and clearly had some sort of bacteria or something that popped the seals up!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this seed butter had a lot of healthy seeds, however, I never got to even try it, because after they sat on my shelf for a few months the oils started leaking out! Not even sure how! I never removed the seals and you can see they were not airtight! I was very upset, because they were clearly ruined, they didn't keep and they weren't cheap! I had to throw them out. A very disappointing buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great nut butter substitute! Healthy and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Best nut butter substitute I’ve ever had. We have nut allergies and celiac. This has been a life saver for me! Healthy and tasty. I love to eat it with celery or apples. I have used it in granola bars and cookies. Oh, and smoothies! Sometimes, I just grab a spoon and eat it out of the jar. I own a bakery and I tell my customers about this stuff all the time. I will say that my 12 year old is not impressed, but I needed the protein boost in my diet so it was definitely more for me. I go through a can every month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Shana B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good Macros
customer_reviews.text: I like to have a good nut butter to incorporate into my line up , and I can say that the Chocolate version here tops my list. I do not care for the plain at all. It has a good texture, but I do make sure to refrigerate it and not have it at room temperature. Great nut variety , some Omega 3s and a lower amount of sugar makes this a good product to insert to your daily or weekly nutrition lineup. The cacao here makes this taste a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Nate,  Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Cost-effective, healthful, slightly different flavor
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an almond chocolate butter, and this option came up. It's an interesting combination of healthy seeds, which is always appealing. It's slightly sweet, but not too much (also good, in my opinion). The only real downside I feel is that there's a slightly "burning" aftertaste, probably due to the salt and/or one of the seeds. Overall I don't feel it's better than low-sugar almond butter, but it's an even healthier alternative that's pretty cost-effective.
customer_reviews.author: bped82

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste and aftertaste after new recipe!
customer_reviews.text: This use to be so good! I reordered and it tastes awful!! There is also a horrible aftertaste that wasn’t there before. I hope they go back to the way they were making it because I will not buy again if it tastes like this.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Bitter (nut-free) butter could be better!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is very bitter. You can taste the bitterness from flax or hemp seed. I don't know ow which though. Plus it is very expensive $11 for 1 pound of nut free butter is too much, and its not even organic to justify the high cost. I will stick with almond or peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: RayJay

customer_reviews.title: Lack of taste
customer_reviews.text: This product it’s a big on marketing but it does not live of to it’s quality and taste. Product has to change. I ha e spoken to many that have purchase the product to be disappointed by the taste
customer_reviews.author: alberto ayala

customer_reviews.title: It's addictive...
customer_reviews.text: Taste great, BUT if you add a tiny bit of stevia, a tiny bit of sea-salt and a tiny bit of Ceylon cinnamon it becomes addictive. It's a real problem because once i start by eating ONE spoonful....i find it almost impossible to stop, so i might eat the whole jar.
customer_reviews.author: Alan D. Graham

customer_reviews.title: best on the market
customer_reviews.text: love it: Updat: I absolutely LOVE this seed butter. I bought it as a gift for my relative who is allergic to nuts. I just bought a 6 pack for myself, and will order again when I'm out. UPDATE: I have ordered more but this time the formula is a bit off. Sadly I need to drop the 5 stars to 3ish. I'm so disappointed :( The 'sweet'/salty taste was fabulous before but now the taste is not as good as before. I'll seek to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hamza

customer_reviews.title: great unique flavor
customer_reviews.text: the creamy product does have some small seeds which make an interesting texture - BUT folks who have small seed digestive issues should be made aware that the product is not creamy smooth as you might expect.
customer_reviews.author: David Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Formula has changed
customer_reviews.text: I order this regularly and the label style recently changed - but the formula also has changed. Different texture - more oily, less thick, less smooth. Tastes like they increased the hemp. And now has natural flavors listed in the ingredients - not found on the previous orders with the old label. I definitely prefer the previous formula. Sorry to see it change - not sure if I'll continue to order this.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: If you loved the original flavor go, for the unsweetened version!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this seed butter, and then the formula changed. It is creamier, which is great, but I am not too fond of the new flavor. I was disappointed because my daughter has food allergies and this was our absolute favorite Peanut Butter replacement. I kept checking back and noticed they added an unsweetened version, so I decided to try it. It tastes like the original, but creamier and easier to spread! I am beyond ecstatic!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Timmerman

customer_reviews.title: WHAT HAPPEN
customer_reviews.text: Horrible taste not like the original one i would like a refund please help horrible packaging and product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: spreading good health
customer_reviews.text: The men and women that make this product debunk any claims that peanut butter fails to provide healthy choices to regular peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: A buyer

customer_reviews.title: This seed butter has great texture and is not too oily like some other ...
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. This seed butter has great texture and is not too oily like some other natural brands I've tried. Has a great sunflower seed flavor. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, not into the super sweet butters...
customer_reviews.text: Totally sweet and gross, spit it out immediately. Bad after taste. I’m allergic to nuts so I try the seed butters. The only seed butter worthy of tasting like peanut butter that I found is TJ’s sunflower seed butter.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I think this stuff is pretty good. I’ve been testing it on various things for about month now. On its own, I think you could say the texture is a little “sandy.” You do need to mix it a little bit, similar to how you would with some organic peanut butters. Neither of those things are a negative for me personally. As for taste, I find the sunflower seeds to be a little overpowering, so I’d like to see that flavor toned down a bit. But this was really yummy on apples, pretzels, and on toast with honey. Definitely an option for people who want to avoid nut butters.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Trifone

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic peanut butter alternative!
customer_reviews.text: For a household with nut allergies we are always looking for good alternatives for peanut butter and have finally found one we can stick with! This seed butter is delicious and kid approved. It is as close to a true peanut butter consistency as we have seen making it a very easy substitute for all of our favorite recipes. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received open rancid product.
customer_reviews.text: Container had leaked oil and become rancid, and I'm not being given an option to receive a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: does not look or taste good
customer_reviews.text: It looks nasty and that usually doesnt bother me, but it wasnt worth "trying" to like it! I really wanted to like it, but I just cant
customer_reviews.author: tine

customer_reviews.title: Salty, creamy, delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I am very impressed by the intense flavor of this seed butter. It is super rich, creamy and surprisingly salty tasting considering it only lists 30mg (1% DV) of sodium per serving! It melts wonderfully on warm bread or is great straight out of the jar. I would absolutely give it five stars if they come out with an organic version.
customer_reviews.author: ALZ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty healthy
customer_reviews.text: Like others have stated, has a type of chemical taste. Very healthy otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Best seed butter!
customer_reviews.text: My very favorite seed butter! I use it as a dessert! I have used it on toast and celery sticks! It really is so good!
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: As good as a dessert!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be buying this product again. Only 1 gram of sugar and low carbs - my go to snack!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Seymour

customer_reviews.title: It tastes healthy
customer_reviews.text: This nut butter is perfect for putting in homemade granola because you won't be able to taste it. It's not the worst nut butter, but it definitely is not the best. I suggest using it for baking. If you like the taste good for you because it's packed with nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Part of my Everyday Routine
customer_reviews.text: Beyond the Equator's 5 seed butter was recommended by a close friend of mine. I make a smoothie every morning and for the longest time, I used powdered peanut butter. After a while, the powdered PB got bland and it wasn't providing any nutritional value. Once I started using the 5 seed butter, there was no turning back. I'm a big fan the 5 seed butter and would recommend it to anyone, whether they are a morning smoothie maker like myself or they would prefer to spread the butter on another food (bread, fruit, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: Casey Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Very seedy and soupy consistency ... will stick to wowbutter
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: I would zero stars if I could! This stuff is nasty and has a bad stevia fake sugar aftertaste. I love sunflower butter and it doesn’t need the horrible sweetener this stuff is made with. Stick to simple don’t bother with this!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for those avoiding sugar
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom, who strictly limits her sugars. She LOVES it! Eats its with with celery or apples as a snack and also enjoys a spoonful by itself. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new fave nut butter!
customer_reviews.text: I am a peanut butter addict and wanted to try something with better ingredients that was guilt-free. This 5 nut butter tastes delicious, would be super versatile on just about everything from celery, crackers to toast, and has the BEST texture. I've never tried a nut butter with a creamier consistency. It is so smooth, and I love that it isn't super oily. It came in on Friday, and I'm already half way done and will be ordering my next one this week, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Yuck.....
customer_reviews.text: Weird bitter taste, at first I thought is was tainted. It just tastes awful. Wish I had my money back.
customer_reviews.author: LAR NASHVILLE

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely keep this product on my reorder list!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seed butter. I cannot eat peanut butter so it is nice to have an option besides just almond butter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gr8t butter
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of this product. I add it to my oatmeal
customer_reviews.author: T DeL

customer_reviews.title: A must for any shopping list!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything buttered: from from almond to walnut and everything in between. I love the taste of this product; the unique blend of the chia, flax, pumpkin, sunflower, and hemp, along with its nutritional benefits makes this item a must for any shopping list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Peanut Butter
customer_reviews.text: My sons allergic to peanut butter so we’ve kept it out of the house for a while. This is the closest tasting thing to it! Obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: Sirmet

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste, texture as well as the 5 seed benefits of beyond the Equator butter! Since, I'm avegetarian, I make alot of smoothies and this adds to the touch along with the sweet creamy chocolate flavor. Keep me full and satisfied for the day.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Nut free alternative
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for daycare lunch. Baby didn’t care for it. I thought that it tasted mostly sunflower butter, which can be purchased at a much better price. Baby is ok with regular sunflower butter, but not the 5 seeds blends. I guess that it’s a good thing she doesn’t have an expensive taste... :). Not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Nutritious
customer_reviews.text: Better taste than my usual sunbutter and a bit more nutritious as well. I use it with fruit spread on my toast every morning. Very filling and satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I figured it wouldn't taste good because of all the seed stuff BUT it tastes great. Creamy and delicious
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jardim

customer_reviews.title: Son did not fall for the switch.
customer_reviews.text: My son's daycare went nut free. I bought this hoping my son didn't notice. I thought it tasted really close however my 4 year old didn't fall for it for very long. Does have an after taste. I started using it in smoothies and it was really good for that use.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY!
customer_reviews.text: Yummy yummy. I prefer it to peanut butter and i love the fact that it is completely sugar free. Delish!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Deborah

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but this stuff is so good I felt like I had to. I recently learned that I have a sensitivity to peanuts and almonds. I bought Wow Butter. Tolerable, but not great. It had a weird aftertaste that I didn’t love. This product tastes great and the texture is fantastic. It even came with a handwritten note. Can’t say enough good things!
customer_reviews.author: G. Marwick

customer_reviews.title: Unappealing
customer_reviews.text: The product has an ugly green color. was expecting peanut butter color as seen online. The taste was only fair. Disappointing because I was looking for a replacement for peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Healthy Alternative!
customer_reviews.text: My first bite I took, I couldn't decide if I liked it or not. But a couple more bites in and I'm hooked! It's a fantastic alternative to peanut butter and other nut butters without any added sugar. I love how full of nutrients it is; a bite or two is the perfect afternoon snack after I've been sitting at my desk all day. And of course, it's versatile just like peanut butter is too. I'm excited to explore all the ways I can incorporate it into different meals and snacks!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: overated
customer_reviews.text: mostly sunflower seed,smells like it tasted like it and is listed as main ingredient. sunflower seeds are cheap. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MTB

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and very smooth.
customer_reviews.text: I love nut butter and I wanted to try this seed butter. It's very tasty and smooth. The sweetened version is probably even better. But I enjoyed it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Melen

customer_reviews.title: It's really yummy!
customer_reviews.text: The consistency or texture is a little pasty rather than creamy, but still good tasting. I think it will be great used in sauces and/or dressings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews first. Awful taste. I'm chucking the whole jar. Terrible after-taste too. UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It tastes terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry, but I have to say this does not taste good. You may be buying it for health benefits or some other reason, but if you are buying it for taste, don't.
customer_reviews.author: dbrakeley

customer_reviews.title: You have been warned!
customer_reviews.text: One star because you can't give zero. Avoid this stuff. I know taste is subjective but I tested one spoonful and it was so awful I spit it out and threw the rest in the garbage. The bad taste remains in your mouth a long time too. One of the foulest tasting foods I ever had the misfortune to try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great peanut-free butter spread
customer_reviews.text: So I can't eat peanut butter. I've airways been allergic. I've had sun flower seed butter, and I love that. So I decided to give this a try. It is the same consistency after all. I love the way this tastes. It's just so good
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for on-the-go people
customer_reviews.text: I love this butter! The taste is different, but better than peanut butter for me. I use it on sandwiches, in smoothies, and as a great, guilt-free energy snack for my on the go life. I keep a jar of it in my desk drawer and a jar in my gym bag. It mixes very well, even in a blender bottle, as its very smooth and doesn't separate.
customer_reviews.author: W. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, but way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This would be a five star rating (six if it was possible) except that it's WAY too expensive. I bought it once on a splurge to try it and it's a delicious treat but it is definitely a treat - much too expensive to be a regular pantry item.
customer_reviews.author: TMatthews

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: All the ingredents are great except, flaxseed. There needs to be a version without flaxseed, plz. Ty
customer_reviews.author: AL SERRETTE

customer_reviews.title: Nutty for the nut butter
customer_reviews.text: I have several different nut butters and have been ordering for some time and this one is put on the very top of my list of best likes. Try it or miss ou on the best.
customer_reviews.author: GAMDIAR

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best butter I have ever tasted. I don't even have any type of nut allergies, but I think I am giving other nut butters up for this product. I was a little skeptical at the price, but WOW is it WORTH every penny!! The ingredients are quality. The salt level is perfectly balanced with the sweetness, and there's no heaps of hidden sugar!!! It's the perfect snack for the health conscious or allergy inflicted person.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin O'Shee

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 5 star although I do think it is a little over priced by a dollar per jar. I eat this like candy on toast or by spoonful's every day. It is a treat.....
customer_reviews.author: Little Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Love it! tastes great and is allergy free
customer_reviews.text: Love it! tastes great and is allergy free. I bought it twice, however, I won't purchase it again because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Not a good flavor
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is horrible on the 5 seed nut butter - tried it with a couple different fruits, veggies, crackers, etc. Couldn't find anything that it could possibly taste good with so I ended up throwing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste and smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love sunflower butter and any nut butter you can think of. This was so gross I had to spit it out. Yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: it does contain sugar
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something to add to a smoothie, it works but I missed the fact that it contains sugar and we are staying away from sugars, this is why I rated it three. It tastes fine and would have been ok without the sugar
customer_reviews.author: allergyqueen

customer_reviews.title: Really good seed butter
customer_reviews.text: Great seed butter, Love the flavor! update: did I say i love this seed butter? It's just amazing strait out of the jar. I sent some to mom and she also enjoys it. I'm going to order a lot more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Hamza

customer_reviews.title: Does not taste good at all
customer_reviews.text: Gross taste and I’m not a picky eater. It also looks dull and grey. Something in it made my skin crawl! I got flushed, head rush and felt sick for 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Bessie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love This Seed Butter
customer_reviews.text: I love to have this with sliced apples for a lite lunch, or on my English muffin for breakfast. They make yummy cookies too, just don't use baking SODA, use baking POWDER. I really like the consistency, much easier to spread.
customer_reviews.author: Lori B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Taste great! Use it daily as a snack along with fruits.
customer_reviews.author: Sil

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good taste
customer_reviews.text: Taste so good. I'm so sad I've been eating peanut butter this long. And this has way more nutritional punch to it. Love.
customer_reviews.author: Sudds

customer_reviews.title: But 2 - Get 1
customer_reviews.text: There was ONE jar in the package not 2 like I paid for —
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: We are huge peanut butter people but our local school is nut free. I've tried so many alternatives, but this is hands down the best. The consistenc is good, creamy with a little crunch from the chia and its just sweet enough. I'm hoping to send it with my kids on sandwiches, but I'll have to stop eating it straight from the jar first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT PROCESSED IN ALLERGEN FREE FACILITY
customer_reviews.text: Although this butter claims to be allergen friendly, it is processed in a facility that processes peanuts and other nuts, so it is NOT safe for those with severe nut allergies. Major bummer (and false marketing, IMO)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: What a great product. It tastes great and way better for ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. It tastes great and way better for you than regular peanut butter. I will continue to order this 5 seed butter.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Sub par flavor.
customer_reviews.text: The product is economical but I am not that pleased with the flavor. It’s not too bad when I add it to a smoothie. I would only buy it again if almond or cashew butter were too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Schadenfruede

customer_reviews.title: Changed Recipe - Not Good
customer_reviews.text: This company has totally changed the recipe, and it is nowhere near as good as it use to be. The flavor is really bland. It’s also thinner and more oily. It use to be so good. I’m so disappointed and won’t order again.
customer_reviews.author: JK Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in delivery
customer_reviews.text: Product had leaked in the box, the container was covered in oil. The box had oil on it. What a mess. I can’t get in touch with anyone for a replacement. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Scooterskitty

customer_reviews.title: TASTES GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my son and he thought it was great...He said that the predominant flavor was sunflower...
customer_reviews.author: JESSE

customer_reviews.title: My favorite seed butter
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this seed butter. I gave it 5 stars even though it is a little expensive, because it tastes so good! It is definitely a treat.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE. STEVIA SUCTALOSE AFTERTASTE
customer_reviews.text: Horrible sucrose lingering flavor and was leaking. Beware. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Junkbondman

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect without the added sweetness!
customer_reviews.text: Not on the same taste level as NUTZO which costs more, and I can do without the faint added sweetness. Over all, it is is fairly good.
customer_reviews.author: ClairedeLune

product_meta.title: Beyond the Equator 5 Seed Butter - Nut Free, Low Carb, Keto, Non-GMO - Creamy 1 pack
feature_bullets: NUT FREE: Produced in a dedicated facility free from peanuts and tree nuts
CLEAN INGREDIENTS: Non-GMO Project Verified, Gluten Free, Dairy Free, Soy Free, Keto Friendly
QUALITY NUTRITION: Chia, flax, and hemp seeds add a nutritious superfood punch—8 grams of protein and only 5 carbs
ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY: It takes about 85% less water to make a jar of 5 Seed Butter than a jar of almond butter!
CUSTOMER SERVICE: Please message us if you have any issues with your order and we'll get it fixed!
